title: SYLVIA
description: If you love French cinema, if you’ve ever daydreamed about falling in love with a beautiful stranger over beignets and coffee, allow yourself the luxury of SYLVIA. Translated into English, this read is not for the light of heart: two Parisian singles meet online and it’s anything but a “meet cute.” Before long, you’re entangled in a web of deceit and lies, avoiding assassins and fearing treachery at every turn. But what’s the truth about Sylvia?Jean-Francois Thoron’s romantic thriller set in the Marais district of Paris, France is available on Kindle.Praise for SYLVIA in the original French version, an Amazon France Top 15 seller! “Highly recommended for dreamers, free spirits, and romance lovers! Something for fans of police procedurals, as well!” “No horror, no blood, no direct violence, and a love story, to boot.”“Very good book, I read in 2 days. I highly recommend this suspenseful tale.”If you enjoyed The French Connection, La Femme Nikita, or Amelie, try SYLVIA.
author: Jean-François Thoron
